column4: Tesla cuts China car prices to absorb hit from trade war tariffs
column5: BEIJING/SHANGHAI Tesla Inc  is cutting the price of its Model X and Model S cars in China  the U.S. firm said on Thursday  in a shift in strategy that will see it take more of a hit from tariffs linked to a biting trade war between China and the United States. | Video

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla cuts China car prices to absorb hit from trade war tariffs
column5: * Tesla cuts Model X  Model S car prices in China by 12-26 percent
